name: 1010 Number
description:
1010 Number, the best strategy game!
Once you play, you can't stop!

The objective is to collect rows of 4 or more blocks with the same number either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally to gain points;
To move a number block around, first select it so that you see it green, Then select another unoccupied place so that it moves there;
Every time you move a block, new blocks are added, And the blocks to be added next are shown at the bottom, except when your move completes rows of 4 or more blocks of same number, no new blocks are added!

If you like it, send us reviews or feedback azhuona@gmail.com!
